name: Cosmic Soldier
storyline: The story takes place in the year 3530, where the KGD star limits have fallen to the evil Quilla empire. The protagonist of the story which you play is a soldier of the Alliance, which sends you to stop the menace of the KDG.
summary: In the game, you must locate 3 data cards and 4 "filters" that allow access to a secret file in the enemy data bank. Data cards and filters are located in different stars of the Quila system, which can be reached immediately via an air shuttle; all the information you need in order to locate the items can be obtained by talking to enemies. Once the items are in your possession, you must locate the data bank and get the file.
